name: MoneyMoney
0:
”Alexa, tell Money Money I spent ten dollars on clothing”
”Alexa, ask Money Money my expenses by category”
”Alexa, ask Money Money to delete my last expense”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: money money
des:
Money Money has been designed for those who are looking for an easy way to keep track of their expenses.

Some examples of Money Money interactions:

User > I spent 50 dollars on clothing
Alexa > I've added 50 dollars to your expenses, under the category called clothing.

User > expenses by category
Alexa > This month you have spent 180 dollars (50 dollars on clothing and 130 dollars on food).

User > delete last expense
Alexa > Okay, I've deleted your last expense; 50 dollars on clothing.

--

Hereafter the kind of commands Money Money understands:

"I spent 20 dollars" - a generic expense
"I spent 100 dollars on clothing" - a one-time expense on a given category

"expenses by category" - to get a report of your current expenses by category

"list expenses" - to get this month's expenses
"list my last 3 expenses" - get details of the last 3 expenses that were declared

"delete last expense" - to remove the last declared expense
"delete expense number 15" - to delete expense number 15, as per the expense list details

--

Currently supported currencies: USD, EUR, INR, CHF
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
